job_details.Vacaturetitel: Azure DevOps (Platform) Engineer With Focus On AI
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Azure DevOps (Platform) Engineer with Focus on AI IT
     * Hybride
     * Utrecht
     * Nederland
     * 36 uur
     * Fulltime, includes Azure Data & AI Services, Azure DevOps, Python, Git but we would really like our candidate to also have skills in popular Rabobank technologies like Kotlin, Java, Cloud Foundry (CF), Kong API, Spring Boot, YAPL pipelines, etc., * Experiment, develop, and debug various AI applications.
     * Design and build CI/CD pipelines according to Rabobank requirements.
     * Monitor and ensure the functionality of programs across testing, development, and production environments.
     * Work with software engineers, data engineers, and data scientists to refine and enhance software solutions.
     * Continuously update your knowledge on development tools, programming techniques, and emerging technologies.
     * Write efficient, testable, and well-documented code.
     * Maintain and support software functionality.
     * Act as a subject matter expert in AI compliance
job_details.full_text:
Azure DevOps (Platform) Engineer With Focus On AI

Azure DevOps (Platform) Engineer with Focus on AI IT
     * Hybride
     * Utrecht
     * Nederland
     * 36 uur
     * Fulltime, includes Azure Data & AI Services, Azure DevOps, Python, Git but we would really like our candidate to also have skills in popular Rabobank technologies like Kotlin, Java, Cloud Foundry (CF), Kong API, Spring Boot, YAPL pipelines, etc., * Experiment, develop, and debug various AI applications.
     * Design and build CI/CD pipelines according to Rabobank requirements.
     * Monitor and ensure the functionality of programs across testing, development, and production environments.
     * Work with software engineers, data engineers, and data scientists to refine and enhance software solutions.
     * Continuously update your knowledge on development tools, programming techniques, and emerging technologies.
     * Write efficient, testable, and well-documented code.
     * Maintain and support software functionality.
     * Act as a subject matter expert in AI compliance

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building and maintaining CI/CD pipelines, monitoring programs across environments, and working with data engineers and data scientists. While AI is mentioned, the core responsibilities lean towards the engineering and operational aspects of AI systems, including debugging AI applications and ensuring their functionality in production, which aligns with the MLOps and productionization focus of an ML Engineer. The mention of 'AI compliance' also suggests a focus on responsible deployment and monitoring of models.

job_tasks.justification: The job description explicitly mentions designing and building CI/CD pipelines, monitoring programs across testing, development, and production environments, and maintaining software functionality. These are core MLOps activities.
job_tasks.phrase: Design and build CI/CD pipelines according to Rabobank requirements.

job_tasks.justification: Monitoring and ensuring the functionality of programs across different environments is a key aspect of production system maintenance and MLOps.
job_tasks.phrase: Monitor and ensure the functionality of programs across testing, development, and production environments.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Experiment, develop, and debug various AI applications' directly relates to the creation and refinement of AI models and applications.
job_tasks.phrase: Experiment, develop, and debug various AI applications.

job_tasks.justification: Writing efficient, testable, and well-documented code is a fundamental software development practice.
job_tasks.phrase: Write efficient, testable, and well-documented code.

job_tasks.justification: Maintaining and supporting software functionality is a core responsibility in software engineering.
Acting as a subject matter expert in AI compliance indicates a need to understand the business context and regulatory requirements related to AI.
job_tasks.phrase: Act as a subject matter expert in AI compliance

job_tasks.justification: Continuously updating knowledge on development tools, programming techniques, and emerging technologies is a clear indicator of the need for learning and adaptability.
job_tasks.phrase: Continuously update your knowledge on development tools, programming techniques, and emerging technologies.

job_tasks.justification: Working with software engineers, data engineers, and data scientists to refine and enhance software solutions requires strong collaboration and communication skills.
job_tasks.phrase: Work with software engineers, data engineers, and data scientists to refine and enhance software solutions.

soft_skills.phrase: Continuously update your knowledge on development tools, programming techniques, and emerging technologies.
Work with software engineers, data engineers, and data scientists to refine and enhance software solutions.
Experiment, develop, and debug various AI applications.
Act as a subject matter expert in AI compliance
